tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE state_changes (
    change_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    state_id INT,
    change_type ENUM('quantum_rotation', 'quantum_translation'),
    change_description TEXT,
    change_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (state_id) REFERENCES quantum_states(state_id)
);

CREATE TABLE state_measurements (
    measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    state_id INT,
    measurement_result BOOLEAN,
    measurement_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (state_id) REFERENCES quantum_states(state_id)
);

CREATE TABLE state_relations (
    relation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    parent_state_id INT,
    child_state_id INT,
    relation_type ENUM('entanglement', 'superposition'),
    FOREIGN KEY (parent_state_id) REFERENCES quantum_states(state_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (child_state_id) REFERENCES quantum_states(state_id)
);
